eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.common

Class TopSnappedSmoothScroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.SmoothScroller
      • androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearSmoothScroller
        • eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.common.TopSnappedSmoothScroller

  • public class TopSnappedSmoothScroller
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearSmoothScroller
    Common class for all Smooth Scroller Layout Managers.
    Since:
    5.0.0-b6 Creation in main package
    5.0.0-b8 Class is now public to allow customization of the MILLISECONDS_PER_INCH
    17/12/2017 Moved into UI package

    • Field Detail

      • MILLISECONDS_PER_INCH

        public static float MILLISECONDS_PER_INCH
        The modification of this value affects the creation of ALL Layout Managers. Note: Every time you change this value you MUST recreate the LayoutManager instance and to assign it again to the RecyclerView!

        Default value is 100f. Default Android value is 25f.

      • vectorPosition

        private android.graphics.PointF vectorPosition

      • layoutManager

        private eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.common.IFlexibleLayoutManager layoutManager
